A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a horrible movie.  It is long and boring and filled with plot holes.  The acting was terrible. What makes it really sad is that these are all great actors. Why can't Gareth Edwards direct all Star Wars movies.  I did not like Force Awakens either and so this is it. I will not be seeing episode IX in the theater I will wait for blu ray to see that movie.
